text:
When you get married on national TV (and who isn't these days), you best be sure that you're wearing a wedding dress that's just as stunning walking down the aisle as it will be on a hi-def big screen. And Teen Mom 2 star Jenelle Evans certainly didn't disappoint with her breathtaking gown. The reality show star recently tied the knot with her love David Eason at their shared home in North Carolina, donning a truly fab frock for the big day. Here are all the deets on her wedding dress.

Loading View on Instagram

On Saturday, September 23, 2017, Evans and Eason walked down the burlap-lined aisle to say their "I dos" in the backyard of their home. After their first kiss beneath a canopy of fresh blooms , guests were treated to favors that included sunglasses stamped with the couple's monikers, and revelers noshed on a wedding cake featuring a bark-like carving of the newlyweds' initials that matched the rustic vibes of the day.

Loading View on Instagram

And while the newlyweds' pint-sized wedding party—made up of Evans' seven-year-old son Jace who walked her down the aisle, her three-year-old son Kaiser who proudly took on the role of ring bearer, and her eight-month-old daughter Ensley Jolie and nine-year-old stepdaughter Maryssa who were both sweet flower girls —was all kinds of adorable, it was hard to look away from the beautiful bride in her gorgeous gown.

Loading View on Instagram

Loading View on Instagram

Loading View on Instagram

The wedding dress Evans wore was an allover French-inspired lace design, complete with a laser-cut scalloped train. The fit-and-flare silhouette featured a low back, thin lace straps, some subtle sparkle, and a sweetheart neckline.

Loading View on Instagram

Loading View on Instagram

See More: Teen Mom 's Jenelle Evans Reveals Why Her Mom Didn't Make Her Wedding Guest List

Totally stunning, right? But where can you score it for yourself?

E! News reports that the dress is Style 905 by designer Martina Liana and retails for around $2999. For a list of boutiques near you that carry the gown, you can check out the designer's website .
title: Teen Mom Star Jenelle Evans' Wedding Dress Is Available Here for $2999
